attacks.name: Wrap
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Regal Cheer
abilities.text: Attacks used by your Pokémon do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Command the Grass
attacks.text: You may search your deck for up to 3 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Hide
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from and effects of attacks done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bemusing Aroma
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Lively Needles
attacks.text: If this Pokémon was healed during this turn, this attack does 100 more damage.

abilities.name: Stimulated Evolution
abilities.text: If you have Shelmet in play, this Pokémon can evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.

attacks.name: Toxic Spore
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Dangerous Reaction
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 120 more damage.

attacks.name: V-Force
attacks.text: If you have 4 or fewer Benched Pokémon, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Smashing Headbutt
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Peck Off
attacks.text: Before doing damage, discard all Pokémon Tools from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Torrid Scales
abilities.text: You must discard a Basic Fire Energy card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Burned.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Round
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each of your Pokémon in play that has the Round attack.

attacks.name: Round
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage for each of your Pokémon in play that has the Round attack.

attacks.name: Round
attacks.text: This attack does 70 damage for each of your Pokémon in play that has the Round attack.

attacks.name: Ancient Seaweed
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each Item card in your opponent's discard pile.

abilities.name: Mighty Shell
abilities.text: Prevent all damage from and effects of attacks done to this Pokémon by your opponent's Pokémon that have any Special Energy attached.

attacks.name: Big Bite
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

abilities.name: Gentle Fin
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may put a Basic Pokémon with 70 HP or less from your discard pile onto your Bench.

attacks.name: Snotted Up
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't use attacks.

attacks.name: Continuous Headbutt
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Sheer Cold
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't use attacks.

attacks.name: Drag Off
attacks.text: Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon to the Active Spot. This attack does 20 damage to the new Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Blizzard Burst
attacks.text: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon for each Prize card your opponent has taken. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Hold Still
attacks.text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Dynamotor
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Lightning Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thunder Fang
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Buzz Flip
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Lightning Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Disaster Volt
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Voltage Burst
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken. This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Rest
attacks.text: This Pokémon is now Asleep. Heal 30 damage from it.

attacks.name: Dream Calling
attacks.text: You may search your deck for any number of Fennel cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Sleep Pulse
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Cellular Evolution
attacks.text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Cellular Ascension
attacks.text: For each of your Benched Pokémon, search your deck for a card that evolves from that Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Evo-Lariat
attacks.text: This attack does 40 more damage for each of your Evolution Pokémon in play.

attacks.name: Slight Shift
attacks.text: Move an Energy from 1 of your opponent's Pokémon to another of their Pokémon.

attacks.name: Calm Mind
attacks.text: Heal 40 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Best Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Double Smash
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage for each heads.

abilities.name: Debut Performance
abilities.text: If you go first, this Pokémon can use attacks during your first turn.

attacks.name: Echoed Voice
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Echoed Voice attack does 80 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Piercing Drill
attacks.text: This attack also does 60 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Rock Tumble
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Hammer Arm
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

abilities.name: Craftsmanship
abilities.text: This Pokémon gets +40 HP for each Fighting Energy attached to it.

attacks.name: Swing Around
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Flail
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.text: If this Pokémon has full HP and would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, it is not Knocked Out, and its remaining HP becomes 10.

attacks.name: Stone Edge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Abundant Harvest
attacks.text: Attach a Basic Fighting Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.text: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Poison Spray
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 60 more damage.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Tighten Up
attacks.text: Your opponent discards a card from their hand.

attacks.name: Tighten Up
attacks.text: Your opponent discards 2 cards from their hand.

attacks.name: Tighten Up
attacks.text: Your opponent discards 2 cards from their hand.

attacks.name: Cursed Slug
attacks.text: If your opponent has 3 or fewer cards in their hand, this attack does 120 more damage.

attacks.name: Wild Lances
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Hard Gears
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 10 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Hard Gears
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 20 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Gear Coating
abilities.text: All of your Pokémon that have any Metal Energy attached take 20 less damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Corner
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Finishing Blow
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Righteous Edge
attacks.text: Discard a Special Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Metal Arms
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 40 more damage.

abilities.name: Metallic Signal
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 Evolution Metal Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Protect Charge
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Gather Strength
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Boundless Power
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use attacks.

attacks.name: Cross-Cut
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Axe Blast
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Basic Pokémon, it is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Scout
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals their hand.

attacks.name: Fly
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from and effects of attacks done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Add On
attacks.text: Draw 4 cards.

attacks.name: Swift Flight
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from and effects of attacks done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Return
attacks.text: You may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Tail Slap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Do the Wave
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Aerial Ace
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Air Balloon
rules: The Retreat Cost of the Pokémon this card is attached to is ColorlessColorless less.

name: Antique Cover Fossil

abilities.name: Protective Cover
abilities.text: Prevent all effects of attacks used by your opponent's Pokémon done to this Pokémon. (Damage is not an effect.) Illustrated by AYUMI ODASHIMA

rules: Play this card as if it were a 60-HP Basic Colorless Pokémon. This card can't be affected by any Special Conditions and can't retreat.At any time during your turn, you may discard this card from play.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Energy Coin
rules: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, search your deck for a Basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Fennel
rules: Heal 40 damage from each of your Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: N's Plan
rules: Move up to 2 Energy from your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Pokégear 3.0
rules: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Supporter card you find there and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Professor's Research
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Prism Energy
rules: This card provides Colorless Energy. If the Pokémon this card is attached to is a Basic Pokémon, this card provides every type of Energy but provides only 1 Energy at a time.
